[[Image:Antlers Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Antlers on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Antlers''' is a castle in [[the Crownlands]], the region controlled directly by the [[Iron Throne]] in [[King's Landing]]. The castle is located north of King's Landing near the border with [[the Riverlands]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/kings-landing/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, King's Landing entry]</ref><ref name="Viewers Guide">[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/kings-landing/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, King's Landing entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels Antlers is the seat of House Buckwell.  It is alternatively called "the Antlers".
